name: Narzugon
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.Diabolical Sense: The narzugon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks made to perceive good-aligned creatures.
traits.Infernal Tack: The narzugon wears spurs that are part of infernal tack, which allow it to summon its nightmare companion.
traits.Magic Resistance: The narzugon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
